text:
Super Mari-
Super Mari-
Super Mario three!
Mario is back but now with plenty more clothes to wear:
The frog suit, hammer brothers suit, and some kind of magic bear!
This game warped my tender brain and now I know why,
The sun comes down from the sky, if you touch turtles you die,
And even raccoons can fly, when P is high. Bye bye bye!

text: Yeah, so I'm hearing this as part of one of Supra's playlists, right? Well, a song from Xenosaga 3 was ending, so I turn my head for a few seconds so catch a bit of the Futurama episode playing on my T.V. All of a sudden, this starts blaring into my headphones.
